title: Account Usage and Information Schema functions views: New column(s) in output | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_03 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the output of the
Account Usage Functions view
and Information Schema Functions view includes the following new columns:
Names of external access integrations specified by the function’s EXTERNAL_ACCESS_INTEGRATION parameter.

Map of secrets specified by the function’s SECRETS parameter, where
map keys are secret variable names and map values are secret object names.
